verses.verse: And God <WH430> blessed <WH1288> <WH853> Noah <WH5146> and his sons, <WH1121> and said <WH559> unto them, Be fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply, <WH7235> and replenish <WH4390> <WH853> the earth. <WH776>

And the fear <WH4172> of you and the dread <WH2844> of you shall be <WH1961> upon <WH5921> every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the earth, <WH776> and upon <WH5921> every <WH3605> fowl <WH5775> of the air, <WH8064> upon all <WH3605> that <WH834> moveth <WH7430> upon the earth, <WH127> and upon all <WH3605> the fishes <WH1709> of the sea; <WH3220> into your hand <WH3027> are they delivered. <WH5414>

Every <WH3605> moving thing <WH7431> that <WH834> liveth <WH2416> shall be <WH1961> meat <WH402> for you; even as the green <WH3418> herb <WH6212> have I given <WH5414> you <WH853> all things. <WH3605>
But <WH389> flesh <WH1320> with the life <WH5315> thereof, which is the blood <WH1818> thereof, shall ye not <WH3808> eat. <WH398>

And surely <WH389> <WH853> your blood <WH1818> of your lives <WH5315> will I require; <WH1875> at the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> will I require <WH1875> it, and at the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of man; <WH120> at the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of every man's <WH376> brother <WH251> will I require <WH1875> <WH853> the life <WH5315> of man. <WH120>
Whoso sheddeth <WH8210> man's <WH120> blood, <WH1818> by man <WH120> shall his blood <WH1818> be shed: <WH8210> for <WH3588> in the image <WH6754> of God <WH430> made <WH6213> he <WH853> man. <WH120>
And you, <WH859> be ye fruitful, <WH6509> and multiply; <WH7235> bring forth abundantly <WH8317> in the earth, <WH776> and multiply <WH7235> therein.
And God <WH430> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> Noah, <WH5146> and to <WH413> his sons <WH1121> with <WH854> him, saying, <WH559>
And I, <WH589> behold, <WH2009> I establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> you, and with <WH854> your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you;

And with <WH854> every <WH3605> living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that <WH834> is with <WH854> you, of the fowl, <WH5775> of the cattle, <WH929> and of every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the earth <WH776> with <WH854> you; from all <WH4480> <WH3605> that go out <WH3318> of the ark, <WH8392> to every <WH3605> beast <WH2416> of the earth. <WH776>

And I will establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> you; neither <WH3808> shall all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> be cut off <WH3772> any more <WH5750> by the waters <WH4480> <WH4325> of a flood; <WH3999> neither <WH3808> shall there any more <WH5750> be <WH1961> a flood <WH3999> to destroy <WH7843> the earth. <WH776>

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> This <WH2063> is the token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> I <WH589> make <WH5414> between <WH996> me and you and every <WH3605> living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that <WH834> is with <WH854> you, for perpetual <WH5769> generations: <WH1755>
I do set <WH5414> <WH853> my bow <WH7198> in the cloud, <WH6051> and it shall be <WH1961> for a token <WH226> of a covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and the earth. <WH776>
And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> when I bring <WH6049> a cloud <WH6051> over <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> that the bow <WH7198> shall be seen <WH7200> in the cloud: <WH6051>

And I will remember <WH2142> <WH853> my covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> is between <WH996> me and you and every <WH3605> living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> of all <WH3605> flesh; <WH1320> and the waters <WH4325> shall no <WH3808> more <WH5750> become <WH1961> a flood <WH3999> to destroy <WH7843> all <WH3605> flesh. <WH1320>

And the bow <WH7198> shall be <WH1961> in the cloud; <WH6051> and I will look upon <WH7200> it, that I may remember <WH2142> the everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> God <WH430> and every <WH3605> living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> of all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Noah, <WH5146> This <WH2063> is the token <WH226> of the covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> I have established <WH6965> between <WH996> me and all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> that <WH834> is upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

And the sons <WH1121> of Noah, <WH5146> that went forth <WH3318> of <WH4480> the ark, <WH8392> were <WH1961> Shem, <WH8035> and Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth: <WH3315> and Ham <WH2526> is the father <WH1> of Canaan. <WH3667>
These <WH428> are the three <WH7969> sons <WH1121> of Noah: <WH5146> and of them <WH4480> <WH428> was the whole <WH3605> earth <WH776> overspread. <WH5310>
And Noah <WH5146> began <WH2490> to be an husbandman, <WH376> <WH127> and he planted <WH5193> a vineyard: <WH3754>
And he drank <WH8354> of <WH4480> the wine, <WH3196> and was drunken; <WH7937> and he was uncovered <WH1540> within <WH8432> his tent. <WH168>
And Ham, <WH2526> the father <WH1> of Canaan, <WH3667> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the nakedness <WH6172> of his father, <WH1> and told <WH5046> his two <WH8147> brethren <WH251> without. <WH2351>

And Shem <WH8035> and Japheth <WH3315> took <WH3947> <WH853> a garment, <WH8071> and laid <WH7760> it upon <WH5921> both <WH8147> their shoulders, <WH7926> and went <WH1980> backward, <WH322> and covered <WH3680> <WH853> the nakedness <WH6172> of their father; <WH1> and their faces <WH6440> were backward, <WH322> and they saw <WH7200> not <WH3808> their father's <WH1> nakedness. <WH6172>
And Noah <WH5146> awoke <WH3364> from his wine, <WH4480> <WH3196> and knew <WH3045> <WH853> what <WH834> his younger <WH6996> son <WH1121> had done <WH6213> unto him.
And he said, <WH559> Cursed <WH779> be Canaan; <WH3667> a servant <WH5650> of servants <WH5650> shall he be <WH1961> unto his brethren. <WH251>
And he said, <WH559> Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Shem; <WH8035> and Canaan <WH3667> shall be <WH1961> his servant. <WH5650>
God <WH430> shall enlarge <WH6601> Japheth, <WH3315> and he shall dwell <WH7931> in the tents <WH168> of Shem; <WH8035> and Canaan <WH3667> shall be <WH1961> his servant. <WH5650>
And Noah <WH5146> lived <WH2421> after <WH310> the flood <WH3999> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> years. <WH8141>
And all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of Noah <WH5146> were <WH1961> nine <WH8672> hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572> years: <WH8141> and he died. <WH4191>
